name: Legendary Mastery Slate
description: Struck to recognize your achievement in reaching Rank 1 - Legendary.

languages.description: Geschaffen, um dein Erreichen von Rang 1 - Legende zu ehren.
languages.name: Meisterschaft-Insignie: Legende

languages.description: Gravée pour commémorer votre réussite en atteignant le Palier 1 - Légendaire.
languages.name: Ardoise de Maîtrise - Légendaire

languages.description: Coniato per riconoscere il tuo successo nel raggiungere il Grado 1 - Leggendario.
languages.name: Targa Maestria - Leggendario

languages.description: 랭크 1 - 레전더리에 도달한 업적을 기리기 위한 표창패입니다.
languages.name: 레전더리 마스터리 슬레이트

languages.description: Acuñado para reconocer tu logro al alcanzar el rango 1 de Legendario.
languages.name: Placa de Maestría de Legendario

languages.description: 为表彰你成功达到传奇段位 - 1 所打造的物品。
languages.name: 传奇精通石板

languages.description: レジェンダリランク 1へ到達したテンノの成果を示す表彰楯。
languages.name: レジェンダリ マスタリー 表彰楯

languages.description: Stworzona, by upamiętnić Twój wyczyn w osiągnięciu Rangi 1 - Legendarny.
languages.name: Tablica Mistrzostwa Legendarny

languages.description: Concedida em reconhecimento à sua conquista por alcançar o 1º Nível Lendário.
languages.name: Ardósia de Maestria: Nível Lendário

languages.description: 篆刻來認可你達成精通段位 1－傳奇的成就。
languages.name: 傳奇精段匾

languages.description: ประทับตรารับรู้ถึงความสำเร็จของคุณในการไปถึงอันดับ 1 - ตำนาน
languages.name: กระดานชนวนความเชี่ยวชาญ: ตำนาน

languages.description: Seviye 1 -  Efsanevi rütbene ulaşma başarını anmak için oluşturulmuştur.
languages.name: Legendary Ustalık Plaketi
